Description: Red Sea International Co (known as: Red Sea) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since November 2006. It operates within the Real Estate sector focusing on Diversified Real Estate Activities. It has Companies operating across Australia and New Zealand, Northern Africa, Melanesia, Western Africa, Eastern Africa and Middle East. Red Sea is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1986.
